text: Othallo Tabia is an Indian professional athlete. He is best known as an Association football or soccer player.Soccerway.com, O. Tabia; retrieved 2012-7-6. ==Career== In the 2011-2012 season, Tabia joined the Pune F.C. team. == Club career statistics == |2011-2012||rowspan="2"|Pune||rowspan="2"|I-League|||||||||||||| |- |2012-2013|||||||||||||||| |||||||||||||| |||||||||||||| |} ==References== ==Other websites== * Goal.com, Othallo Tabia Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Indian footballers
